00031 class SurfaceBase: public Function {
00032     public:
00035         typedef VecMath::Vector<4> &function_type(double, double);
00037         typedef VecMath::Vector<4> raw_function_type (double, double);
00038 
00039         SurfaceBase() { }
00048         SurfaceBase(const QString &name,
00049                     double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00050                     double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00051                     ParameterMap _parms = ParameterMap()):
00052                 Function(name, _parms),
00053                 tmin (_tmin), tmax (_tmax), dt (_dt),
00054                 umin (_umin), umax (_umax), du (_du),
00055                 tsteps (unsigned ((tmax-tmin)/dt+1)),
00056                 usteps (unsigned ((umax-umin)/du+1)) { }
00057 
00058     protected:
00060         unsigned &getTsteps() { return tsteps; }
00062         unsigned getTsteps() const { return tsteps > 0? tsteps: 1; }
00064         unsigned &getUsteps() { return usteps; }
00066         unsigned getUsteps() const { return usteps > 0? usteps: 1; }
00067 
00068         double &getTmin() { return tmin; }          
00069         double getTmin() const { return tmin; }     
00070         double &getTmax() { return tmax; }          
00071         double getTmax() const { return tmax; }     
00072         double &getDt() { return dt; }              
00073         const double &getDt() const { return dt; }  
00074         double &getUmin() { return umin; }          
00075         double getUmin() const { return umin; }     
00076         double &getUmax() { return umax; }          
00077         double getUmax() const { return umax; }     
00078         double &getDu() { return du; }              
00079         const double &getDu() const { return du; }  
00080 
00082         virtual VecMath::Vector<4> &f(double, double) = 0;
00084 
00087         VecMath::Vector<4> &operator () (double u, double v, double = 0) {
00088             return f(u,v);
00089         }
00090 
00091     static double _min, 
00092                   _max, 
00093                   _d;   
00094 
00095     private:
00096         double tmin, 
00097                tmax, 
00098                dt,   
00099                umin, 
00100                umax, 
00101                du;   
00102         unsigned tsteps, 
00103                  usteps; 
00104 };

00111 class Surface: public SurfaceBase {

00117                  double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00118                  ParameterMap _parms = ParameterMap());

00120

00122                                 const VecMath::Vector<4> &T);
00123 
00124         virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00125         virtual void Draw (void);
00126 
00127         virtual void ReInit(double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00128                             double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00129                             double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv);
00130 
00131         vec4vec2D Data (void) { return X; } 
00132 
00134         virtual const unsigned getDefinitionSpaceDimensions() { return 2; }
00135 
00136     protected:
00137          virtual vec4vec1D df (double, double);
00138          virtual function_type normal;
00139 
00140          void Initialize (void);
